titleStmt.title: Musæum Tradescantianum: or, A collection of rarities. Preserved at South-Lambeth neer London by John Tradescant.
titleStmt.author: Tradescant, John, 1608-1662.
Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677, engraver.
Wharton, Thomas, 1614-1673.
Ashmole, Elias, 1617-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Grismond, and are to be sold by Nathanael Brooke at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: A catalogue of the nucleus of the present-day Ashmolean Museum, compiled by Tradescant with the assistance of Thomas Wharton and Elias Ashmole.
The portraits are signed by Wenceslaus Hollar.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
